subject: Lockouts
Collective Bargaining
Basketball
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: The contract, agreed on in principle several weeks ago, includes a 12 percent reduction in player salaries, a limit to the length of player contracts and a host of other changes.
snippet: The contract, agreed on in principle several weeks ago, includes a 12 percent reduction in player salaries, a limit to the length of player contracts and a host of other changes.
